itemDescription: English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1822 to 1826

wikipedia_page.main: Horace Bates (19 August 1793 – 14 December 1879) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1822 to 1826.  He was mainly associated with Kent and made nine known appearances in first-class matches, including five for The Bs.
